translations: 进步的，先进的；逐步发生的，逐步发展的；向前移动的；（音乐）现代的，新潮的；（税制，税种）累进的；（动词）进行式的；（纸牌游戏，舞蹈）搭档轮换的
进步分子，改革派人士；进行时（或体）；（印刷）分色打样

sentences.sentence: One prominent symptom of the disease is progressive loss of memory.
sentences.translation: 这种病的一个突出症状是记忆的逐步丧失。

sentences.sentence: Willan was able to point to the progressive changes he had already introduced.
sentences.translation: 威兰能够指出他已经带来的有进步意义的变化。

sentences.sentence: Halsey was identified as a leading proponent of the values of progressive education.
sentences.translation: 哈尔西被认为是进步教育价值观的首要支持者。
